'''Eamon''' was a [[Pre-Númenóreans|Southlander]] during the late [[Second Age]]. Eamon was invented for ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power]]'' by [[Amazon Studios]], where he was portrayed by [[Berynn Schwerdt]].<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=https://www.imdb.com/title/tt9788618/fullcredits|articlename=Full Cast & Crew|dated=|website=IMDb|accessed=6 September 2022}}</ref>
